title: From e-service quality to behavioral intention to use e-fitness services post COVID-19 lockdown: When a crisis changes the social mindset
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): M Rocío Bohórquez, Alejandro Lara-Bocanegra, Rosario Teva, Jerónimo García-Fernández, Moisés Grimaldi-Puyana, Pablo Gálvez-Ruiz
